title: Pull Yourself Out of the Culture War! with Haidt, Carnegie and Quality
description:
Jonathan Haidt, who for me has the most convincing theory on why there is a "Culture War" recommends an old friend who you likely would consider outdated. While he may reference Henry Ford and Tallulah Bankhead as examples of charm and persuasion, don't be fooled! How to Win Friends and Influence People is a book we all should be reading if we are serious about stopping the madness, improving our manners and becoming better people!

Blog Post: https://wordpress.com/post/aqualityexistence.com/79
